alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 22 at 6:01PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN PIMA COUNTY THROUGH 645 PM MST... At 558 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Ajo to 16 miles northwest of Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument. Movement was east at 40 mph. The portion of the line north of this area through portions of Maricopa County is under a severe thunderstorm warning. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Ajo, Hickiwan, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument, Why, Gunsight, and KuKatch. This includes the following highways... Route 85 between mile markers 33 and 62. Route 86 between mile markers 53 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
